description: The Cliffs of Ontheon had a wide range of ore deposits found alongside their sweeping natural walls. Darknuts became experts at harvesting these unrefined metals to crate their legendary armors.
tooltip: The Cliffs of Ontheon had a wide range of ore deposits found alongside their sweeping natural walls. Darknuts became experts at harvesting these unrefined metals to crate their legendary armors.(Ore harvesting rate is increased by 25%, 50% if it's from Metal Deposits)
